title: So once vayne crit build is gone what you gonna do about this??
body:
{{champion:67}} 
{{item:3153}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3006}} +2 tank items.
she is gonna be doing 13% of your health in true damage every 2 AA ontop of 8% of current health in physical damage with botrk lol.
honestly she can just go botrk rage blade a full tank lol. and she will massacre your frontline and your squishy alike.
